subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: With the loss of the dominant starter Masahiro Tanaka because of a partially torn ligament in his pitching elbow, the team must turn to unproven pitchers like Chase Whitley and Shane Greene.
snippet: With the loss of the dominant starter Masahiro Tanaka because of a partially torn ligament in his pitching elbow, the team must turn to unproven pitchers like Chase Whitley and Shane Greene.
